title: DWORD_TO_BCD (Function)
text:
FUNCTION DWORD_TO_BCD : DWORD
Converts one DWORD in binary code into one DWORD in BCD code
Use
BCD_TO_DWORD
for the reverse conversion.

rows.Name: DWORD_TO_BCD
rows.Comment: Value in BCD code for the inputX

rows.Name: X
rows.Comment: Value in binary code. Valid range: 0..99999999
